sentences.en: ...eight mortgage companies, seven of which are on the brink of insolvency.
sentences.cn: …8家抵押贷款公司，其中7家濒临破产。

sentences.en: A company - wide cash management program must be concerned with minimizing the firm's risk of insolvency.
sentences.cn: 公司现金管理的目标是使公司的支付风险率降低到最低限度.
破产: 合法的无清偿能力的状态.

sentences.en: Greece will still be perilously close to insolvency.
sentences.cn: 希腊仍将危机四伏、濒于破产.

sentences.en: In truth an insolvency was never really on the cards.
sentences.cn: 事实上,破产还从未真正出现过.

sentences.en: Indeed, concerns about Bank of America's insolvency have grown , not shrunk, in the past few months.
sentences.cn: 的确, 在前几个月里关于美洲银行破产的担忧有增无减.

sentences.en: Insolvency matters are covered under the Bankruptcy Code.
sentences.cn: 资不抵债事项由《破产法典》调整.

sentences.en: Managerial Incentive and Recovery from PFI Project Insolvency.
sentences.cn: 京都大学工学研究科和京都大学経営管理大学院.

sentences.en: Normal insolvency procedures should not be applied to banks.
sentences.cn: 通常的破产程序不应当适用于银行.

sentences.en: Secondly, damages should occur during the critical period before insolvency proceedings begin.
sentences.cn: 二是损害行为须发生在破产程序开始前的临界期内.

sentences.en: Siemens declined to comment on how the insolvency would affect its business.
sentences.cn: 西门子拒绝评论破产将对其业务产生何种影响.

sentences.en: The big banks still verge on insolvency and they still aren't lending.
sentences.cn: 大银行仍然徘徊在破产的边缘,他们也不贷款.

sentences.en: The company is in a state of insolvency.
The company is on the verge of insolvency.
The UK's only helicopter manufacturer was on the brink of insolvency.
sentences.cn: 英国唯一的直升飞机制造商处于破产的边缘.

sentences.en: The ultimate cause was insolvency, not lack of liquidity.
sentences.cn: 最终的结果是公司破产, 而非缺乏资金流动性.

trans.tran_cn: 破产，无力偿付债务，倒闭，无偿债能力
trans.tran_en: Insolvency is the state of not having enough money to pay your debts
